In case of temporal constraints, the generated code is like this:
expr("40AE484C3A9BF23BE65C0B135D4B1E33",
     (org.drools.modelcompiler.domain.StockTick _this) -> _this.getTimeFieldAsLong(),
     var_$a,
     (org.drools.modelcompiler.domain.StockTick $a) -> $a.getTimeFieldAsLong(),
     D.after(5L, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, 8L, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
)

So I externalize lambdas one-by-one calling replaceLambda() instead of calling extractLambdaFromMethodCall().
